content:
SubscribeContextCallback<TContextItemType> Delegate

Definition

Defines a callback method that will be invoked when a context item changes.

In this Article

public delegate void SubscribeContextCallback<TContextItemType>(TContextItemType item) where TContextItemType : ContextItem;

Type Parameters

TContextItemType

The type of the context item.
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
SubscribeContextCallback<TContextItemType>
